SELECT f_expensetype_template_id as "f_expensetypeTemplateId", f_expense_type_name as "f_expenseTypeName", f_expense_type_desc as "f_expenseTypeDesc", f_type_template_id as "f_typeTemplateId" FROM .t_expensetype_template WHERE 1=1
f_expensetype_template_id = #f_expensetypeTemplateId#
f_type_template_id = #f_typeTemplateId#
$orderBy$
f_expensetype_template_id asc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM .t_expensetype_template WHERE 1=1
f_expensetype_template_id = #f_expensetypeTemplateId#
INSERT INTO .t_expensetype_template (f_expensetype_template_id, f_expense_type_name, f_expense_type_desc, f_type_template_id ) VALUES (#f_expensetypeTemplateId#, #f_expenseTypeName#, #f_expenseTypeDesc#, #f_typeTemplateId#)
DELETE FROM .t_expensetype_template WHERE f_expensetype_template_id = #f_expensetypeTemplateId#
